description: It's Bad For Ya, Carlin's Emmy-nominated 14th and final HBO special from March of 2008 features Carlin's noted irreverent and unapologetic observations on topics ranging from death, religion, bureaucracy, patriotism, overprotected...

review.name: Nasty Old Guy Has Nothing Left
review.reviewBody: Same old tired worn out routine. The words, the rhymes, all done better before. All that's left is a mean nasty little guy without a funny bone in his body. Just an angry little man, on a last cash grab from his diehard fans. Time to rest in pieces, Gramps. Your funny moments are over.
